Privacy Policy

Last updated: July 28, 2025

At Blue Island Security, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect the information you provide to us when you use our website.

Information We Collect

When you use our website, we may collect the following information:

  • • Name and email address — when you fill out the contact form;
  • • Message content — any information you include in your message;
  • • Email address — when you subscribe to our mailing list.

We do not collect sensitive personal data or financial information through our website.

How We Use Your Information

We may use the information we collect for the following purposes:

  • • To respond to your inquiries or messages;
  • • To provide you with updates or promotional emails if you have subscribed to our mailing list;
  • • To improve our website and services.
Email Marketing

If you subscribe to our newsletter, you agree to receive occasional emails from us. You may unsubscribe at any time by following the link at the bottom of our emails.

Data Protection

We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure.

Third-Party Sharing

We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties.

Your Rights

You have the right to request access to, correction, or deletion of your personal data. To exercise these rights, please contact us via the contact form.

Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated date.

Do you have questions, suggestions, or want to discuss how we can help protect your business?

We’re always ready to talk. Please fill out the form below and our team will get back to you shortly.

Ransomware Attacks
Ransomware Assessment
Strengthen Your Defences Against

Ransomware has evolved to become more sophisticated and destructive. Modern attacks not only encrypt data but also exfiltrate valuable information, posing a dual threat to organizations.

With ransomware gangs targeting businesses of all sizes, it's crucial to understand and fortify your defences. This is why Blue Island Security has developed a rapid, comprehensive Attack Surface Assessment to identify your external assets, key gaps and vulnerabilities with 25 unique ransomware testing scenarios.

Download PDF
Key Features
Comprehensive simulation of ransomware & crypto mining scenarios
In-depth analysis of your network's vulnerabilities to ransomware attacks
Thorough assessment of data exfiltration risks & employee susceptibility
Outcome
Harden your org. against ransomware attacks & gain full insight into your vulnerabilities
Develop a comprehensive ransomware defence strategy based on real-world scenarios
Identify & fix critical ransomware gaps before they cause harm…

Blue Island Security's Ransomware Assessment Service delivers indepth security analytics with full ransomware exploit simulation and assessment across your environment. We validate critical exposures to prevent potential exploitation.

Our comprehensive assessment will quickly highlight & prioritize any previously unknown security gaps, misconfigurations and threats across your environment.

Rapid Insights & Ransomware Assessment

Blue Island Security's Ransomware Assessment Service utilizes powerful tools to quickly discover and build a complete picture of your enterprise security posture against ransomware and data exfiltration, providing timely, actionable insights

What we’ll do
1
Rapid simulation of ransomware and crypto mining attack scenarios
2
Thorough assessment of data exfiltration risks & 25 scenarios
3
Analysis of employee susceptibility to social engineering attacks
4
Comprehensive report with prioritized findings & remediation guidance

Surface & Vulnerabilities
Attack Surface Assessment
Discover & Assess Your Unknown Attack

Vulnerable infrastructure is a major challenge for organizations, with over 20,000 new vulnerabilities disclosed annually, and exposed infrastructure responsible for 60% of breaches.

With the proliferation of Ransomware and sophisticated attacks it’s never been more critical to harden your organization against external attackers.

This is why Blue Island Security has developed a rapid, comprehensive Attack Surface Assessment to identify your external assets, key gaps and vulnerabilities

Download PDF
Key Features
Comprehensive discovery of your complete attack surface & internet connected assets
Reveal critical exposures on publicly connected devices & Infrastructure
Rapidly assess key vulnerabilities & prioritise key remediation.
Outcome
Harden your organization to attacks & gain a full insight into your attack surface
Develop joint plans & next steps for continuous Attack Surface Management
Identify & fix critical vulnerabilities before they cause harm…

The Blue Island Attack Surface Assessment delivers in-depth security analytics with full external asset discovery and Vulnerability Assessment across your environment. We will validate critical and high exposures to validate exploitability.

Our comprehensive assessment will quickly highlight & prioritize any previously unknown security gaps, misconfigurations and threats across your environment.

Rapid Discovery & Vulnerability Assessment

Blue Island Security’s Attack Surface Assessment will quickly discover and build a complete picture of your enterprise security posture providing timely, actionable insights:

What we’ll do
1
Rapid discovery of all know & Unknown external assets
2
Index all known & discovered assets for comprehensive testing
3
Assess & Prioritize all vulnerabilities against the latest intelligence
4
Comprehensive report with prioritized findings & remediation guidance

Surface & Vulnerabilities
Digital Identity Assessment
Discover & Assess the status of your Identities

In 2023, exploiting valid accounts became the most common entry point for attackers, accounting for 30% of all incidents

With AI enabling threat actors to deliver sophisticated phishing and social engineering attacks, it has never been more critical to identify and secure your digital identities.

Blue Island Security leverages years of experience to conduct our Digital Identity Assessment (DIA). This assessment identifies key vulnerabilities and provides a prioritized action plan to enhance your security posture.

Download PDF
Key Features
Identify Privileged Users with weak passwords that can be easily cracked or guessed
Discover critical vulnerabilities in your AD Infrastructure
Highlight inactive admin accounts and those with old passwords
Outcome
Discover Indicators of Compromise and Indicators of Exposure in your AD.
Prioritized AD Security Guidance with MITRE ATT&CK correlation.
Build A Secure Identity Strategy

The Blue Island Security Digital Identity Assessment (DIA) provides a comprehensive analysis of your privileged users, including how their accounts are managed and identifying critical vulnerabilities in your Active Directory (AD) configuration. The assessment also evaluates risks associated with Group Policy and potential weaknesses in AD Delegation.

Our DIA offers visibility into your current identity management state and includes prioritized recommendations for remediating or mitigating any discovered weaknesses or vulnerabilities.

Discovery & Strategy Packages

Blue Island Security will deliver an assessment of your Active Directory or Azure Active Directory, providing clear recommendations on any security enhancements and a foundation roadmap for your Identity Journey.

What we’ll do
1
Integrate with your Active Directory or Azure Active Directory
2
Scan for security weaknesses across AD Admins, Group Policy and more
3
Mapping against MITRE ATT&CK framework, validated by Identity Experts
4
Comprehensive report with prioritized findings & remediation guidance
